  • Constructor Details

    • PhysicalMovement

      public PhysicalMovement(String newName, String newDescription, int newPP, int newPower, int newPrecision, PokemonType newType, int newPriority)
      Constructor for creating a new PhysicalMovement
      Parameters:
      newName - The name of the movement
      newDescription - A description of what the movement does
      newPP - The initial Power Points (PP) available for this movement
      newPower - The base power of the movement
      newPrecision - The accuracy percentage of the movement
      newType - The elemental type of the movement
      newPriority - The priority level of the movement in battle

  • Method Details

    • doAttackTo

      public int doAttackTo(Pokemon attacker, Pokemon target) throws PoobkemonException
      Executes the physical attack from one Pokemon to another. The damage calculation uses the attacker's Attack and the target's Defense. Applies type effectiveness multipliers and random variance to the damage. Reduces PP by one after use.
      Specified by:
      doAttackTo in interface Attackable
      Specified by:
      doAttackTo in class Movement
      Parameters:
      attacker - The Pokemon performing the attack
      target - The Pokemon receiving the attack
      Returns:
      The amount of damage dealt
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - INVALID_MOVEMENT if PP is zero, MISSED_MOVEMENT if accuracy check fails

    • copy

      public Movement copy()
      Creates a copy of this PhysicalMovement with the same properties
      Specified by:
      copy in class Movement
      Returns:
      A new PhysicalMovement object with identical properties
